titleStmt.title: A satirycall dialogue or a sharplye-invectiue conference, betweene Allexander the great, and that truelye woman-hater Diogynes
titleStmt.author: Goddard, William, fl. 1615.
Alexander, the Great, 356-323 B.C.
Diogenes, d. ca. 323 B.C.

publicationStmt.publisher: By George Waters] for all such gentlewomen as are not altogeather idle nor yet well. ocupyed,

notesStmt.note: "A morrall satire, intituled the Owles araygnement", F2r-end.
Printer's name supplied and publication date conjectured by STC.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
